Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeUsernameController
    Provides a simple controller used to change the username string associated with a specific user id within the elastic search database.
    FavouriteController
    Provides a simple controller used to add a Question ID to a User object's User.favourites list and update the elastic search database to reflect this change.
    MainController
    Provides a simple controller used to add a Content object to the elastic search database.
    NewAnswerController
    Extends MainController to provide functionality specifically tailored to handling Answer objects.
    NewQuestionController
    Extends MainController to provide functionality specifically tailored to handling Question objects.
    NewReplyController
    Extends MainController to provide functionality specifically tailored to handling Reply objects.
    NewUserController
    Provides a simple controller used to add a User object to the elastic search database.
    UpvoteController
    Provides a simple controller that toggles the upvote status of a Question or Answer object in the elastic search database.
